trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Ann Arbor
There were no other sightings in Ann Arbor on or around July 4th 2013
divs: sighting detailson the evening of july 4th 2013, as we watched fireworks from our windows we observed a row of lights over ann arbor as planes flew by and fireworks were on display. lights were 9 in total and were in a curved vertical line, red and orange, stationary and not blinking. gradually lights disappeared as if they were being turned off until one was left for a 1\2 minute then all were gone.
